Cover Letter

Cover Letter Workshop

Tailor a cover letter to different jobs

Cover letters are a way to stand out from the pile. Hiring managers expect to see specific experience in your cover letter related the job description.

Guides, examples, resources, etc.

Examples

These examples should be used only as suggestions and guides. Not as models for how you have to complete your resume or cover letter.
